title: Dear My Baby: Watashi ga Anata wo Shihai suru made
overview: In the spring of 2025, a shocking incident occurs where a popular actor stabbed his female manager with a knife and the news shocks the whole of Japan. Yoshikawa Keiko is a veteran manager at the bottom of despair when she happens to pass Moriyama Takuto on the street. Feeling a connection with him, Keiko invites him in the world of entertainment and does everything to make him debut as an actor. Slowly, Keiko invades Takuto's friendship and private life, and her love for him gradually escalates way beyond the role of a manager.
